name: The Gloomy Night of Sylvester Brown (DEMO)
name_original: The Gloomy Night of Sylvester Brown (DEMO)
description:
In this game, made with RPG Maker XP, you play as an uninteresting bookworm, named Sylvester Brown, who is accompanied by his friends to visit the old Tucker Mansion III, but what they don't know is what lays inside it's massive walls.

Uncover monsters, find miscellaneous items, collect babies, and reach the top floor!  (plus much, much more)

•Over 5 unique monsters to meet!*

•Never-before-seen gameplay mechanics!*

•Amazingly clever puzzles and riddles!*

•Epic animation to really get your blood pumpin'!*

•3 unforgettable friends to accompany you!*

•Loads of collectible keys, items and such to find!*

*in full version
